title: The Wiccan Kitten
description: Before her landlord's exorcism banishes the innocent apparition haunting her Salem apartment, Freyja Amador must cast a spell to save her ghost cat. Unfortunately, her spell's success can only be guaranteed through sex magick on Halloween nightâ€”two days away.She needs a man. And she believes she has just met the perfect one.Shane Logan, however, has troubles of his own. Operating under a centuries-old faerie curse, Shane must find a woman who can fall in love with him within three days--and having sex is not an option or he will turn to dust.Will they both get what they need before time runs out on Halloween?
author: Susanne Saville
